page.title: 05 Roads.
page.content: As our area is very rural and contains many villages most of the roads are narrow country lanes linking the small farming communities together like an intricate pattern. There are still many tracks and rights-of-ways clearly marked although the farmers have ploughed up some or marked others with their own signs to keep visitors from damaging crops or letting cattle out by not shutting gates. The two main roads in our area are the A35 which runs from Bridport to Dorchester and then on to Poole. The other main road is the A37 which runs from Yeovil to Dorchester. Recently this road has been improved at Charminster and lower Wrackleford. They both become choked with holiday traffic in the summer.
